title: My gingerbread house
ingredients: ['250g butter', '200g dark muscovado sugar', '7 tablespoons golden syrup', '600g plain flour', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '4 teaspoon ground ginger', 'For the icing', '300g icing sugar', '1/4 teaspoon cream of tartar', '2 egg whites', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla']
